lg.comment: Used for large corner radii on elements where action is emphasized.

md.comment: Used for medium corner radii on elements where action is emphasized.

sm.comment: Used for small corner radii on elements where action is emphasized.

full.comment: Corner General Full is used for containers with a fully rounded corner radius

lg.comment: Corner General Lg is used for containers with a large rounded corner radius

md.comment: Corner General Md is used for containers with a medium rounded corner radius

none.comment: Corner General None is used on containers with no corner radius

sm.comment: Corner General Sm is used for containers with a small rounded corner radius
Used for small corner radii on indicator elements

standard.comment: Corner used for all text input fields.

md.comment: Stroke token used for medium borders on action components

sm.comment: Stroke token used for small borders on action components

lg.comment: Stroke token used for large general borders

md.comment: Stroke token used for medium general borders

none.comment: Stroke token used for scenarios where a stroke token must be provided, but none should be displayed.

sm.comment: Stroke token used for small general borders

md.comment: Stroke token used for medium borders on indicator

sm.comment: Stroke token used for small borders on indicator components

emphasis.comment: Stroke width used for borders on input components when emphasized (typically hover and focus)

emphasis-plus.comment: Stroke width used for borders on input components when heavily emphasized (active text field)

regular.comment: Standard stroke width used for borders on input components.

progress.comment: Stroke token used to show progress within a component
